channel.title: [Added] New URL for Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary (UN OCHA Humanitarian Plans)
channel.description:
UN OCHA @ximboden provided us with an updated link for one of the [Humanitarian Scope Vocabulary](http://iatistandard.org/203/codelists/HumanitarianScopeVocabulary/) codelists.
The URL for **Code 2-1 (Humanitarian Plans)** will be updated FROM: http://ftsarchive.unocha.org/docs/IATICodelist_HS2-1.csv
TO: https://api.hpc.tools/v2/public/plan?format=xml
The new link provides the full list of all plans with the codes in it. [Github request](https://github.com/IATI/IATI-Codelists-NonEmbedded/pull/243/files) has been submitted and changes will be implemented within a week.
